Text:
Info: This is the swiss made 11 min. version, 
not the most famous black & white 18 min. german made version

the 18 min one just has a long introduction..
the 11 min is the act..

It's the same play with the same actors but a different recording to the well-known one with the intro by Heinz Piper. I.e: the camera angle is different, some of the scenery is different, the performances are different. The audience does not laugh as much.
